author: Earl Moore
content:
Andreas, I've quietly followed this blog for a long time and have always enjoyed your work.  I think there's been a growth in your photography and to me it's also interesting seeing which title you match up with the photos and to read some of you thoughts on it all.  I especially enjoy those occasions you share some technical info or fact about a camera, lens, software or process. 

I try every once in a while to leave a comment here about one thing or another.  No matter what I may say in the comments I leave, it comes down to simply saying I appreciate what you share and thank-you!.
